import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, ListGroupItem, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProductsDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductsDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const product = {} return (

{product.name}

Price:â‚¬{product.price}

Description:- {product.description}

Status: {product.status} Go Back
) } export default ProductScreen
